text: Ecublens is a municipality in Ouest lausannois in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. It is a suburb of Lausanne. The Lausanne metro line 1 and many bus lines come to Ecublens. The nearest train station is Renens. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Ouest Lausannois Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Ecublens, Vaud
